pageContext.title: Cíclico
pageContext.description: Santi & Tuğçe's first full-length album, Cíclico blends elements of Afro-Cuban and Brazilian rhythms, Jazz harmonies, and Electronica sound design with warm vocals and subtle melodic lines.
pageContext.credits:
Original Tracks by: Santi & Tuğçe 
Cover Art by: Santiago Ferreira (Santi)
All tracks mixed and mastered by Colin Mahoney
